articles.content: The lead developer of ShibaSwap, Shytoshi Kusama took to Twitter on Saturday to give a heads-up about an upcoming announcement. Shytoshi revealed that he and the Shiba Inu team are “working” on an up… [+2281 chars]

articles.title: Xiaomi to only sell smartphones in India now - Economic Times
articles.description: The decision comes at a time when Indian authorities are probing the local unit of the Chinese smartphone company for alleged violation of foreign exchange rules. The Enforcement Directorate that probes money laundering has frozen the company's bank assets wo…
articles.content: New Delhi: Xiaomi India has shut down its financial services business, four years after its launch, terming the decision as part of a strategic shift to focus on the core business of selling smart de… [+2000 chars]
